item.description:
Hello Ladies,

It's been awhile since the group has met.  Let's regroup and get the momentum going once again with our upcoming networking event.  Let's create a group that will truly serve and benefit our members.  Please plan to come to our kick off networking event to reconnect with fellow business owners and make new connections.  Bring business cards and promotional materials to share.

Our featured speaker of this evening is Karen Piedra, Reiki practitioner/instructor and RE/MAX realtor.  Karen will present tips on blessing your home and home office.  With her training in Reiki and experience in real estate, she understands the deep impact that homes have on one's physical and emotional health.  She will then lead us in a guided visualization in attracing your ideal client (the law of attraction in practice).  Karen will also be available to give short sessions for those who would like to experience the energy healing of Reiki.

We will set aside time for group introductions at the event when you tell us who you are and what you do.  We will have light refreshments and drinks.

Hope to see many of you there!
item.name: Let's Regroup!
